title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.30 - Operation of elevators by persons other than Port Authority employees prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.30 - Operation of elevators by persons other than Port Authority employees prohibited

State Regulations

No person other than employees of the Port Authority shall
operate any freight elevator or passenger elevator (except for the operation in
automatic passenger elevators of such controls as are designed for use by
passengers) at the World Trade Center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1290.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
